name: PowerofMantra
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: power of mantra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will help you to chant the mantra 108 times. If required you can even listen to long-chanting for 1 hour. Initially, we will start with the mantra Om Nam Shivay, more mantras will be added as the skill updates
This is designed to relax your mind, increase focus, have a happier state of mind and get a better quality of sleep.

Chanting is an ancient technique used in India for ages. Even if you are not a religious person, then also, this skill can make a big impact on your life. As this skill is not merely for worshipping your God, but there are much more equally useful scenarios. If you want to practise meditation daily, and you find it difficult to concentrate, then you can start meditation with chanting. Similarly at night if you have difficulties while sleeping, then also, you can use this skill. Just play it for 15 minutes before sleeping, and relieve your stress and have a good night's sleep.

If you have any specific request for mantras or any feedback, feel free to post it in your comments.

P.S. Audio file is sourced from the internet, no copyrights.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
